hints.content: $15{,}690$ = $0 \text{ hundred thousands} + \redD{1 \text{ ten thousand}}$ + $\tealD{5 \text{ thousands}}$ + $\goldD{6 \text{ hundreds}}$ + $\purpleD{9\text{ tens}}$ + $0 \text{ ones}$

Now, let's fill in $\redD{10{,}000}+\tealD{5{,}000}+\goldD{600}+\purpleD{90}$ on the place value chart.

$0$ | $\redD{1}$ | $\tealD{5}$ | $\goldD{6}$ | $\purpleD{9}$ | $0$

Hundred thousands | Ten thousands | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
 :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: |:-: |:-:
$0$ | $1$ | $5$ | $6$ | $9$ | $0$
